item.description:
This is cross posted hiking event from my own hiking meetup group in VT.

From the prominent spur (= Stowe Pinnacle, 2651 ft) on the northwest side of Hogback Mtn in the Worcester Mountain Range in Vermont., there are excellent views of Mt. Mansfield and other peaks in the main range of Green Mountains, as well as Stowe Valley.

Slated for residential development, the forest of the northern side of the Pinnacle were purchased by the Stowe Land Trust to protect its integrity and views.



Hiking Level:
Easy to moderate. Total distance is approximately 1.4 miles x 2 = 2.8 miles for roundtrip.

Elevation Change: 1520 ft ascent
Hiking Book Time: Hike In 1.5-2 hour, Hike Out 1 hour
Including lunch time for 30min at the summit, estimated hiking time will be 3-3.5 hours in total.

Optional Tour after hike: Depending on your interest, we can stop by Ben&Jerry's Ice cream Factory Shop on Rt 100.



Suggested Meetup Locations:

1) Shaw's on Rt100, Waterbury, VT between 9:25-9:35AM, leave 9:40AM
Address: 820 Waterbury Stowe Rd, Waterbury, VT 05676
This is the exact meetup location at the parking lot.
Shaw's is good location where you can buy drink, snack, sandwiches. (And plus restroom! )

2) At the trailhead of Stowe Pinnacle at 10AM
Approximate Address: 607 Upper Hollow Rd, Stowe, VT


This is the Google map for driving direction from A) Shaw's on Rt 100 to B) The trailhead parking lot.



When you sign up, please indicate where is your meetup location at RSVP comment line.
Weather check point (hike or postpone) is 7/23(Fri), 9PM.

I'm looking forward to meeting/hiking with new hikers! Beginner hikers are welcome to join!!
If you have any questions, please feel free to email me.

Event Organizer,
Tomoko Nakajima
item.name: Stowe Pinnacle (2651 ft) Hike in VT
